archimate:Goal.name: Operate services using Continuous DevOps
archimate:Goal.documentation:
This is according to Michael Lenahan in the Tech Services All-Hands Call 2023-06-01. Although this is an unusually technical goal for the leadership, Lenahan seem to understand it, which make it a still viable goal for the leadership. The assumption is that Lenahan is supporting the rest of the leadership in understanding this goal.
At its core, DevOps is about culture, people, and enabling tools and processes. It encourages more agile and responsive development, leveraging automation, continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD), microservices, infrastructure as code, monitoring, and testing, among others, to deliver software faster and more reliably.
